Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Culpability \Cul`pa*bil"i*ty\ (k?l`p?-b?l`?-t?), n.; pl. {Culpabilities} (-t?z). [Cf. F. culpabilit['e].] The state of being culpable. [1913 Webster]
culpability n : a state of guilt [syn: {blameworthiness}, {culpableness}]
